tool_description: Analyzes customer's historical return patterns to inform return authorization decisions and identify potential fraud or abuse.

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to look back for return history analysis

include_financial_impact.description: Whether to include financial impact analysis

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer not found in system.
Invalid analysis period: Period must be between 30 and 730 days.
Insufficient data: Customer has no return history for analysis.
Data access error: Unable to retrieve customer return history.
usage: Input customer_id and optionally specify analysis_period_days and include_financial_impact. Tool analyzes return patterns and flags potential issues.

total_returns.description: Total number of returns in analysis period

return_rate_percentage.description: Percentage of purchases that were returned

common_return_reasons.description: Most frequent return reasons for this customer

risk_score.description: Risk score from 0-100 based on return patterns

recommended_action.description: Recommended action: approve, manual_review, additional_verification, deny

total_refunded_amount.description: Total amount refunded to customer in analysis period
